results.content: This is my second course with this instructor. I love how detailed he is in his explanations and why something works or doesn't.  I would buy any course from this instructor as long as I am interested in the subject. I know I will learn it well and enjoy doing it. I would recommend this course to everyone.

results.content: It was a good match for me! It was easy and fun to engage in the videos from the beginning of the course. Course content is really awesome and covers wide aspects. Really learned a lot form it. This course is definitely the best you could find while learning Angular. The instructor explains everything in detail. Thanks!!

results.content:
Excellent course at the perfect pace with an excellent outline of building on concepts from basic to advanced. Great explanations of why and very good best practices thrown in. 

And of course, Chris is a great and experienced presenter - very enjoyable to listen to as in instructor!!
